shrimp.name: Blinn
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Blinn specular term. This is meant to be used in a network with an ambient and a diffuse term. Add Cs/Os as needed. A good starting point for experimentation might be to use the Oren-Nayar diffuse term. The specular color value is passed to aov_specularcolor, while the specular value, to the aov_specular AOV presets.
